name: Boggs Beans
description:
current=v0.6.2 My new game - made in pico 8 edu

THIS IS SHAREWARE DO WHAT YOU WANT WITH IT BUT PLEASE CREDIT ME

-plot- Bogg's 9 beans have gone missing! He needs at least 4 to make his casserol! Now go find them inside the mountain and bring them back to his house!

-controls- arrows to move x to see inventory

-Code by me (toblerone aka rinkachi-rinkitata) - -Thanks to @thattomhall for who stole the coal? link -

- also on lexaloffle website - link

-used poke(0x5f2c,3) for 2x effect
